channel.title: Virtualserver on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Virtualserver on SoftLayer API

item.title: List Instances
item.description: require 'softlayer_api' require 'pp' # Credentials to the API are read from a configuration file by default. # See https://github.com/softlayer/softlayer-ruby/blob/master/lib/softlayer/Config.rb#L11-L44 SoftLayer::Client.default_client = SoftLayer::Client.new pp SoftLayer::VirtualServer.find_servers
